content:
Adith has worked on several projects, including "CampusAdmin Pro" and "IBaby-Ecommerce."

1. CampusAdmin Pro:
   - Type: Mini-Project
   - Timeframe: Jan 2023 to Jun 2023
   - Description: Developed an advanced college administration platform using Django. The project aimed to streamline student and employee data management. Implemented features included robust user authentication, CSV import/export, and role-specific modules for admin, office staff, and teachers. The project improved operational efficiency by 40% and integrated a bulk email system for seamless communication with over 500 users daily.

2. IBaby-Ecommerce:
   - Type: Project
   - Timeframe: Jan 2023 to Apr 2023
   - Description: Built a Django-based e-commerce platform focused on baby products. The project aimed to provide a seamless shopping experience with user-friendly product listings, advanced filtering, and secure payment integration. It enhanced the checkout process, reducing cart abandonment rates by 15% through a more efficient order management system.
